title: ISic000697. I.Sicily inscription 000697
body:
Facsimile Images

------
[---]CC̣[---]
[---] ex ((·)) [---]
[---]X̣XIIII [---]

Apparatus criticus

Text controlled against photograph; Manganaro: [- - ex test. HS]CC [- m.n. - ]; lapis: CO also possible.
2: Manganaro: [ut - - ]ex [usuris? -]; lapis: traces of serif after interpunct.
3: Manganaro: [?die natali distributio] XXIIII [- -]; lapis: space after final vertical.

translation

commentary

Manganaro offers an entirely exempli gratia restoration following IlS 6468, suggesting it might be concerned with financial arrangements for funerary celebrations; but other interpretations are possible.

bibliography

    Manganaro 1989 166 no. 27 fig. 27 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
